hibernate-mapping.query: select cpustat.cpu, cpustat.date, cpustat.user, cpustat.system from SentinelCPUStatisticEntity as cpustat where machineid = 1 and date >= :date order by cpu asc, date asc
select memstat.date, memstat.used, memstat.total from SentinelMemoryStatisticEntity as memstat where machineid = 1 and date >= :date order by date asc
select diskstat.disk, diskstat.date, diskstat.used, diskstat.total from SentinelDiskUsageStatisticEntity as diskstat where machineid = 1 and date >= :date order by disk asc, date asc
select diskiostat.disk, diskiostat.date, diskiostat.read, diskiostat.write from SentinelDiskIOStatisticEntity as diskiostat where machineid = 1 and date >= :date order by disk asc, date asc
select netstat.device, netstat.date, netstat.send, netstat.receive from SentinelNetworkStatisticEntity as netstat where machineid = 1 and date >= :date order by device asc, date asc
select netiostat.device, netiostat.date, netiostat.send, netiostat.receive from SentinelNetworkIOStatisticEntity as netiostat where machineid = 1 and date >= :date order by device asc, date asc
